superflous: This array is not included in the harness-filter-3 test harness input spec so it's simply clipped off by the harness input filter stage and never passed to the harness bodyFunction.
We know that our harness filter test examples all have a fairly predictable harnessRequest signature. Here we use knowledge of how arccore.discriminator works inside to craft a
a test that routes through discriminator to select the harness. But, when called the harness rejects the harnessRequest because although it was sufficient to get through arccore.discrminator,
(because after seeing testMessage3 discrminator knows it can only be harness-filter-3) it was nonetheless insufficiently complete to pass harness input spec.

harnessRequest.name: Frame Latch OPM Test #1
harnessRequest.description: Run our Observable Frame Latch OPM declaration through the OPM test harness.

constructorRequest.name: Observable Frame Latch
constructorRequest.description: Frame latch provides a way to create a value and attach a model that transitions between waiting and updated process steps whenever the value is written. This allows consumers of the value (other OPM typically) to monitor frame latch process to know when the value is updated so that they can read the new value and do whatever they need to with it.

updated.description: The value managed by the frame latch has been written.

waiting.description: Frame latch value has not changed since last signalled update.

opmRef.name: Observable Frame Latch
opmRef.description: Frame latch provides a way to create a value and attach a model that transitions between waiting and updated process steps whenever the value is written. This allows consumers of the value (other OPM typically) to monitor frame latch process to know when the value is updated so that they can read the new value and do whatever they need to with it.

updated.description: The value managed by the frame latch has been written.

waiting.description: Frame latch value has not changed since last signalled update.

constructorRequest.name: d2r2/React Client Display Adaptor
constructorRequest.description: Manages the details of initializing and dynamically updating the client application view (DOM display surface) via @encapsule/d2r2 and Facebook React.

opmDataSpec.____description: Shared memory definition for the d2r2/React Client Display Adaptor OPM.

ComponentRouter.____description: A reference to previously-constructed <ComponentRouter/> instance (a React component that implements @encapsule/d2r2 dynamic layout protocol).

DOMElement.____description: A reference to the DOM element to be be managed by the d2r2/React Client Display Adaptor (obtained with document.getElementById).

clock.____description: A frame latch used to trigger dynamic rerendering of the client view via d2r2 <ComponentRouter/> and Facebook React RTL's.

observableProcessModelSets.name: Observable Frame Latch
observableProcessModelSets.description: Frame latch provides a way to create a value and attach a model that transitions between waiting and updated process steps whenever the value is written. This allows consumers of the value (other OPM typically) to monitor frame latch process to know when the value is updated so that they can read the new value and do whatever they need to with it.

updated.description: The value managed by the frame latch has been written.

waiting.description: Frame latch value has not changed since last signalled update.

opmRef.name: d2r2/React Client Display Adaptor
opmRef.description: Manages the details of initializing and dynamically updating the client application view (DOM display surface) via @encapsule/d2r2 and Facebook React.

opmDataSpec.____description: Shared memory definition for the d2r2/React Client Display Adaptor OPM.

ComponentRouter.____description: A reference to previously-constructed <ComponentRouter/> instance (a React component that implements @encapsule/d2r2 dynamic layout protocol).

DOMElement.____description: A reference to the DOM element to be be managed by the d2r2/React Client Display Adaptor (obtained with document.getElementById).

clock.____description: A frame latch used to trigger dynamic rerendering of the client view via d2r2 <ComponentRouter/> and Facebook React RTL's.

pathRenderContext.____description: Fully-qualified OCD path of the descriptor object to be deep copied and passed to <ComponentRouter/> via this.props.

pathRenderData.____description: Fully-qualified OCD path of the descriptor object to be deep copied and passed to <ComponentRouter/> via this.props.renderData.

wait_invariants.description: Waiting for d2r2 ComponentRouter instance (how to render), and DOM element (where to render) invariants to be specified.

wait_inputs.description: Invariants have been satisfied. Waiting for initial d2d2 ComponentRouter render data context to be specified.

initialized.description: Preparing for initial render operation. Determining if we rehyrdate server-rendered view. Or, replace it.

rehydrate.description: Rehydrating the specified d2r2 ComponentRouter render data context to reconstruct server-rendered d2r2 ComponentRouter render data context in the client application.

render.description: Rendering the specified d2r2 ComponentRouter render data context to refresh layout and client-side React component mountings.

rendering.description: Rendering the specified d2r2 ComponentRouter render data context. Please wait for the operation to complete.

ready.description: Waiting for next clock signal to re-render client application view.

filterDescriptor.operationDescription: Routes the request to one of N subfilters based on request signature analysis.

opmRef.name: Observable Frame Latch
opmRef.description: Frame latch provides a way to create a value and attach a model that transitions between waiting and updated process steps whenever the value is written. This allows consumers of the value (other OPM typically) to monitor frame latch process to know when the value is updated so that they can read the new value and do whatever they need to with it.

updated.description: The value managed by the frame latch has been written.

waiting.description: Frame latch value has not changed since last signalled update.

filterDescriptor.operationDescription: Routes the request to one of N subfilters based on request signature analysis.

harnessRequest.name: DOM Location Processor OPM #1
harnessRequest.description: Attempt to instantiate the current DOM Location Processor OPM via our test harness.

constructorRequest.name: DOM Location Processor
constructorRequest.description: Hooks and monitors DOM location events and publishes them via an observable frame latch. Also, provids programmatic control over DOM location.

routerEventCount.____description: A count of the total number of observed changes of the DOM location object induced by all actors.

lastOutputEventIndex.____description: A count of the total number of routerEventDescriptor objects written to the model's output.

locationHistory.____description: Array written by the sink hashchange event action for every observed change in location.

updateObservers.____description: A Boolean flag set by DOM Location Processor actions to indicate to the DOM Location Processor model that it should transition to update step.

update.description: The observable browser location has been updated. Information about the current location, and who set it is available in this model's output namespace.

harnessRequest.name: Holistic App Client OPM #1
harnessRequest.description: Attempt to instantiate the current App Client Runtime OPM via our test harness.

constructorRequest.name: Holistic Client App Runtime
constructorRequest.description: This model manages, tracks, and controls the lifecycle of the client application.

boot0_hook_events.description: Hooking DOM events pertinent to tracking the lifecycle of this instance of the client application running inside the user's browser.

boot1_start_kernel.description: Start core client app kernel subsystems.

boot2_query_derived.description: Query the derived client app for information required to initialize the core client app runtime.

boot3_wait_kernel.description: Wait for the core client app kernel subsystems to become available.

boot5_wait_browser.description: Wait for the browser to finish loading the HTML document and its referenced external resources (scripts, CSS, images, fonts, JSON, ...

boot6_deserialize_app.description: Access the boot ROM embedded in the hosting HTML document to get the suspended process state of the derived application.

boot7_load_app_memory.description: Load the deserialized app into the OCD to initialize the client app runtime.

boot8_init_app_view.description: Initialize the view and d2r2/React display models. Performs a d2r2/ReactDOM.hydrate operation ultimately.

running.description: The client application is online and awaiting input from external actors.

error_process_boot_failure.description: Client application process boot failed due to unrecoverable error(s).

error_process_resume_failure.description: Client application process resume failured due to unrecoverable error(s).

error_process_runtime_failure.description: Client application process crashed at runtime due to unexpected and unrecoverable error(s).
